website_summaries.verdict: 42cc engine delivers ample power for a variety of jobs such as trimming medium to large branches.
pros: Ideal for cutting medium to large-sized branches
5-point anti-vibration system and cushion wrap handle provides balance and comfort while operating.Easy pull starts due to QuickStart
cons: Kill switch does not offer the safety it promises

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love the saw, HOWEVER..!
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this chainsaw since for the menial tasks I would throw at it, the price couldn’t be beat. Upon receiving my SECOND saw, I found that both would not lubricate the bar and chain. I tried several viscosities of bar/chain oil, but neither worked out. At one point while cutting, the blade and bar began smoking and the “aroma” of an in-oiled chain was obvious. Kudos to Amazons return policy, but I have to give this 2-thumbs down for my experience. (( also, as others have noted, bar/chain oil is not included in the purchase))
customer_reviews.author: ftb

customer_reviews.title: Bad from the Factory
customer_reviews.text: At first warmup the saw clutch started smoking and then the throttle sped up on its own. The plastic side cover started to melt from the heat. I started it again and the throttle speed increased again with no user interaction. These MTD/Remington Chinese made saws are also heavier than the competition with no more power to show for the weight. It had trouble doing what a 32cc saw does. Also, the oiler is a bad design, one cannot keep oil in it while it sits or else it leaks. Not worth the aggravation!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money!  Maybe not for Newbies?
customer_reviews.text: Worked great out of the box. That is after I purchase premixed fuel. I highly recommend that you purchase the Ethanol free, high 95 octane fuel with fuel stabilizers.  The only real issue I had was that the chain did stretch and come out of it's guide on the chainsaw. This would not have been a Big issue for someone with more experience using and maintaining a chainsaw. The instructions that came with the saw were not very helpful. After several tries, I was able to get the chain back on and working correctly. I would recommend this unit to anyone that is willing to learn and not just use!
customer_reviews.author: dmccor1

customer_reviews.title: Vapor lock- shoots gas from tank
customer_reviews.text: This chainsaw worked fine for 6 months. It then started stalling when idling, even after adjusting the carb. Shortly thereafter, it began shooting gas out of the tank when opened. Dangerous. Remington customer service required that I take it to a maintenance shop and pay upfront with the hope that I will get reimbursed. Amazon was unable to help.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good Saw, Real Value
customer_reviews.text: I had run another brand for 30 years and actually thought this would be a "light duty saw" based on the price. Not so, made by MTD, this saw does the same as any other 16 inch unit. The instructions are very clear. I used it to buck and block a 14" tree including a start and two restarts. The bar oil is 30W, the fuel 40 to one, the chain is Oregon, and the file is 5/32. A case and tool are included. Be careful of course!
customer_reviews.author: PapaTom

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Broke within 20mins. Cutting limbs on furn tree, died. Went to return and need to go via manufacturer...buyers beware. Update. After getting no help from manufacturer, Amazon customer service just made it right for me. While this was a poor product experience, Amazon continues to amaze me by always doing the right thing. So in summary...Amazon is awesome, this chain saw however is Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: PRO VS NOVICE
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing of chainsaws except for what I've seen watching people use them or in photos or on TV. I bought this particular chainsaw based on price for the most part. It was easy to figure out...wasn't too heavy...started up fairly well first time. The only thing I experienced that I learned to deal with is....if you've been using it for a while and then shut it off...plan on letting it sit for at least 30-minutes. It WILL NOT RESTART until it has cooled sufficiently. Since I'm a senior and a novice at this...the break worked out just fine. So...no real harsh complaint...just a learning curve that has not made me wish I had purchased another brand.
customer_reviews.author: PROUD GRAMPA

customer_reviews.title: ... twice for 3 trees and so far it is great for a smaller chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice for 3 trees and so far it is great for a smaller chainsaw. Starts great and runs well. The carrying case is great also! I am looking forward to a long life with it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent saw for small jobs, expected more power
customer_reviews.text: Saw arrived with small crack on plastic housing. Initial start up quick and easy. Chain cut well for first couple hours. Adjust chain tension and went through 4”-6” beech fairly easily. I expected a little more power went attempting to cut through wider limbs. Cold Start on second day needed a little more effort. Went through a few beech trees and chain has dulled after a total of 4 hours. Saw is not too heavy or loud which is a plus when working for extensive time. Only real complaint is how quicklybchain has dulled, perhaps this is standard for factory issued chain. Hope to have better experience with new sharp chain
customer_reviews.author: gus argaluza

customer_reviews.title: Great saw! Filled it up with gas
customer_reviews.text: Great saw! Filled it up with gas, added the included chain oil. Followed the instructions and it fired right up. I've been chopping up all kinds of wood.. I did not like it at first, but after it was broken in a little, it became much more likeable. Comes in a great protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Knuckles

customer_reviews.title: Good saw for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This saw is easy to use and has worked good for us. For the size of our property someone else probably would have bought a huge expensive chainsaw. I've cut up at least 6 felled tress, removed large logs, fallen limbs, and plan to do a lot more. I cut one felled tree wrong and the blade got stuck. I was afraid the saw would be bent and unusable but it keeps on ticking. Only negative so far is one of the nuts that holds the blade in place came loose and got lost in the grass. Picked up a new nut and was back in action. Great entry level saw for around the home.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Broken Case
customer_reviews.text: Saw is as advertised and arrived with shipping box in good shape however there was nothing inside the box to cushion the saw and the carrying case was broken. Talked with manufacturer customer service and was advised they couldn't replace just the case and to return complete unit to Amazon. Unfortunately I need the saw for immediate storm damage clean up so I guess I will just have to live with it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Luedke

customer_reviews.title: Great little chain saw for the money
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Poulan with this Remington when the Puolan died and could not be revived. This Remington works great, plenty of power. Good instructions. Not critical but I do like the case, plenty of room inside for spare chain and two bottles of chain oil. Used it recently to cut down a dying cherry tree in our cul de sac. Powered through it quickly and easily. Started immediately. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: George Clooney

customer_reviews.title: Use it all day without at snag
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Stihl or Echo chainsaw, but it's still very good for what it's designed to do. I've used it for a few days spaced over a couple months and it never fails to start up, even after sitting for several weeks. I've used it all day a couple times and never noticed it over-heating or acting strange. It isn't the most robust chainsaw out there, some of the plastic is kind of thin, but it seems to be well designed where it matters. The perfect chainsaw for the average homeowner doing occasional yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem and the return window was too short.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was working fine the first time I used it. Then the next time I went to use it, most of the bar oil had leaked out into the case. I refilled it for my second use, and tried to tighten the cap just a bit tighter so it wouldn’t leak, and the cap stripped out, so now it won’t tighten at all. Checked my order and I was past the 30-day window for a return, so I’m stuck with it, trying to figure out what to do with the leaking cap.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Good saw for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not a stihl or johnsered but for the price you cannot top this saw. MTD made. Cast crankcase not plastic. Good oiling system. Not too heavy. Great power. Starts easily cold or warm. Case is huge. I like.
customer_reviews.author: scotty dogg

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming and weak
customer_reviews.text: So, this thing kind of stinks. It is only good for little twig beaches up to maybe some medium ones. It has a very hard time starting (least of my concern) but, trying to cut anything down is a challenge. It has minimal power and the chain constantly slips off. I would not recommend this for anyone who isn’t looking to just cut down some small branches. You will be disappointed. At this point, it barley works and I have tried new chains which seem to fall off pretty quickly. Will likes throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Alim D Pirmohamed

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for the home owner
customer_reviews.text: Great little chain saw, smoke sometimes but get the job done; I was able to cut a medium size tree with it; pay for itself already; I don’t know how long it will last but I’m satisfied already.
customer_reviews.author: popo

customer_reviews.title: When you need to cut up branches...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for an overgrown backyard, and low and behold a week later we had a violent windy storm that left branches down and hanging all over the city. He was visibly excited to use his new chainsaw to chop up a large branch that fell over our fence. It not only worked well, but he had a lot of fun, so overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded

customer_reviews.title: Case arrived broken!
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet fired up the chainsaw...It looks okay with no outward sign of damages. I bought this particular one because it had good reviews and came with a case. However the case arrived broken and can not be repaired. I would like to return the case for one that is not damaged...but there is no option to return just the case and I don't see a need at this point to return the saw and the case just because the case is busted. I paid extra to get the case...my mistake as I paid extra for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Quality consumer grade machine.
customer_reviews.text: Quality consumer grade machine. Followed the instructions provided to start and had no problems. If you let it sit for more than 10 minutes, you have to go through the “cold start” procedure again. Put a good 3 hour session on it and it made quick work of a dead tree in the backyard. It can get a little heavy after three hours but isn’t too much. Pretty nimble as well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: Leaks bar oil like crazy.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed this from the day I got it fill up the bar chain oil either half way or all the way leave it for a few hours and it'll leak out all over the place. Looked for a screw lose and everything is tight and still leaks all over the place. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Good little saw
customer_reviews.text: Used for splitting large oak rounds. I knew saw was too small for the job when I bought it but it worked just fine anyway. I figured that was a good test. It should work perfectly for 8 or 10 inch trees or branches etc. Like I said, good little saw.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great chainsaw for the price. Have been cutting several trees with some as large as 4ft around. It took a little while to first run from the box. But once the fuel got in, I’ve been able to start at ease several time. Currently clearing 40 acres and already cleared 3 acres so far.
customer_reviews.author: LouRidge

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CHAINSAW I HAVE OWNED!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST saw I have ever owned! Including a Husqvarna saw i had. I used my new Remington for hours cutting trees 18-22 in diameter and about 35 feet in height, DON'T listen to the negative feedback that other people has written they simply don't know what there doing so they blame the chainsaw, now the only issue I had with my was the case came banged up a bite but AMAZON took care of that, so If you are looking for a great saw look no further!!!!! VERY HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Someone with a question.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a decent chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several chainsaws over the years and this one reminds me of a older Poulan that I loved. It's rugged, well built, starts every time, good on gas and bar oil. First Remington I've had and very glad I did some research to find a good one. I can't even put my Ryobi up for sale. My conscience won't let me. Great price too. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rocap

customer_reviews.title: Nice saw but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This saw is no light weight piece of equipment. It seems sturdy and runs good. We haven't really used it yet. Just started it up. We are happy with it for what we intend to use it on. The price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Colley

customer_reviews.title: Mainly great for clean up and smaller projects.
customer_reviews.text: I was dissappointed with the first saw that came but, Amazon made it right by sending me out a new one due to the clutch freezing up after just one use. The second one worked and ran like a champ for all my small needs that I had ..... small oak tree and some limbs that were dead on others.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Frye

customer_reviews.title: Leaking cahin oil since start
customer_reviews.text: Finally found out it's the chain oil plastic cap leaking, it doesn't close, very cheap and badly made, eats 1/4 gallon oil every use, drains oil when sitting. Useless, terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Z

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. Worked fine for about an hour of run time, now it will just not run. It actually will start and run, but it won’t cut; the chain has no force. Spark plug is good, it’s sharpened correctly, air filter is good, fuel is new and mixed right. Total piece of junk. Stick with the brands you know
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dahl-Bredine

customer_reviews.title: The chain at first didn't slide good enough and woundn't spin at full speed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 4 months ago and have ran into several problems already. The chain at first didn't slide good enough and woundn't spin at full speed, had to get a new one then it worked for about 2 weeks. I put it away for a month, then tried to use it again, now it's not getting enough air and won't run properly. Very disappointing with this. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well. Used once and pull string broke. Had to deal with Remington directly to replace. Really impressed with Remington customer service and the speed they shipped the new chainsaw within the week.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good saw
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this a few days but I really like it. It’s pretty heavy duty and the chain seems to stay decently tight. It’s my first saw and it’s easy to use. I would recommend for other first time buyers. Only downfall was mine came with a crack in it but I needed it the next day so I couldn’t return. Overall I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tully

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chainsaw - powerful! Great price, too. These guys don’t advertise, so the savings get passed along. I’d like if the chain tensioning screw we’re metal, though. Otherwise, handy case! Great tool for any homeowner with trees.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This saw is junk!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst saw I’ve ever used. For five years I have a battery operated chainsaw but decided to upgrade to a gas model. It took 1 attempt to cut down a small tree(less than 8 inches in diameter) for the chain to burn up. Obviously the Oiler doesn’t work. I bought a replacement chain and it won’t fit in the groove of the bar. This model is also underpowered for even the smallest limb. Don’t buy this boat anchor. I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Figueredo

customer_reviews.title: Just one problem
customer_reviews.text: What a novel idea it would have been for the folks at Remington to send out a new chainsaw with a SHARPENED blade. I made one or two cuts and thought, gosh, it's a small saw maybe it just doesn't cut so fast. Then I tried a couple of times to cut off a 6" trunk from a pine tree. All I got was smoke. It couldn't need sharpening already. Well yes it did. After sharpening it worked just fine. Starts easy enough, etc.
customer_reviews.author: tim in cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: made nice cuts Con
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Saw started right away, made nice cuts Con: chain needed adjustment right out of box - too tight - wouldn't rotate around bar Once adjusted to move freely it felt rough rotating around drive sprocket Seemed a little under powered - wanted to bog down Refused to restart once it got hot
customer_reviews.author: Dean Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Runs great
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far I've used it 2 days in a row and cut 6 8-10 inch thick trees down and it did great never bogged down
customer_reviews.author: blake james guidroz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and light weight. My husband loves it and only problem is he wants to cut down everything in sight...LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: A big step up from an electric chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Easy to use, Easy start. Came with a sturdy case with chain cover. I have used it on 4 good size trees with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for the price
customer_reviews.text: This saw right out of the box.... "started right up"... I took out six threes of mid size all were forty plus tall, no big deal, I wish I had bought this saw earlier. I'm thing of buying four more as Christmas gifts. Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: nf

customer_reviews.title: Great for medium to large branches
customer_reviews.text: I own an acre and have about 30 trees to maintain. This is perfect for pruning, and cutting up anything that falls in a wind or ice storm.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy saw !
customer_reviews.text: This is a good saw, starts easily and saws well, but my God it's HEAVY !!!!. I am a old man with bad shoulders, it is to much weight for me, will have to get a lighter saw, but if you are a bull it's a good saw !
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great chainsaw, my only complaint is it’s a tad on the heavy side, and the pull starter rope broke as soon as I got it. Customer service was great and sent me a replacement at no cost right away .
customer_reviews.author: F. Messina

customer_reviews.title: Problem restarting
customer_reviews.text: Starts ok, but after using it a while - turning it off - it will not start?
customer_reviews.author: Ckc

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid saw, worth every bit of the money.
customer_reviews.text: Got the 16". The chain that came on it was pretty soft...get an Oregon s57 chain and it runs through trees like that's its job. Good saw....no frills. Had it a few months and I use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of trash, started leaking oil badly after one use, very difficult to cut trees
customer_reviews.author: jesse mullen

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well but needed chain resharpened
customer_reviews.text: My husband, once he got his chainsaw, he was a mad-man cutting and trimming branches, all over the place. He loves it but it needed the chain to be re-sharpened in short time, after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Koller

customer_reviews.title: So far very good chainsaw.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chainsaw to replace a 20-year-old Poulan. I was a little skeptical at first because wasn’t Familiar with the Remington brand But has used it to cut up a tree that fell in my yard and it works very well. So far there’s nothing I do not like about it and will recommend it To anyone who is looking for a good lightweight chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: as described well made runs like a champ comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: as described well made runs like a champ comes with everything you need .Cut down several nice size trees so far
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The order showed up sooner than expected, setup was easy and quick. I used it the first time to cut up a large tree limb that had been struck by lightning. The saw is lightweight and perfect for light cleanup around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Angie S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for stocking up for winter and clearing out down branches.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The chainsaw started on the second pull. I used it for a couple of hours. It just what it was built for.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Parton

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't seem like a 42cc engine
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem like a 42cc engine. It seems very underpowered. Slipped a chain after I tightened it. I've used it very lightly. I'm not a fan. If I could take it back, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Just like the Craftsman 16" - only difference is lower price.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the Craftsman 16" - only difference is a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Absolute crap!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap!!! Couldn't run more than a third of a tank of gas without shutting the saw down to keep it from ceasing due to running extremely hot. No help from MTD CS for warranty. Thank you Amazon for making it right!
customer_reviews.author: ThisGuy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light-to-moderate jobs
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’vr Only used it for small trees (sun 1ft diameter) and breaking down limbs, etc but it’s holding up well
customer_reviews.author: James Brewer

customer_reviews.title: great saw
customer_reviews.text: saw works great and the case allows me to have it mobile!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great hobbyist saw
customer_reviews.text: Needed a hobbyist chain saw for doing my lathe work! Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Allred

customer_reviews.title: Junk run away
customer_reviews.text: Complete piece of crap worked for one day now cuts off as soon as you touch a piece of wood with it. My worx electric chainsaw has more power and is more reliable. This thing is just sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good saw!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for this review I'm impressed I've ripped down several trees to make benches and stools etc.did the job I work them hard not just your basic tree trimming good saw for the money as I also purchased the 20".
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for brush and saplings
customer_reviews.text: It does not like to run when it is cold, or when the motor warms up. For what I paid I am not totally disappointed. It served its purpose to clear brush, but it's not good for much else more than a small job.
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel ross

customer_reviews.title: 16 inch chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed. Seems to cut and start very well. Held up great cutting hard wood
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: reliable and safe
customer_reviews.text: A little tougher to start but works great. Just make sure to tighten the blade after one to two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Pourzandvakil

customer_reviews.title: really liked the chain saw till I open the case and ...
customer_reviews.text: really liked the chain saw till I open the case and saw all the chain oil had leaked into the case this is the reason for 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a chainsaw. It cut stuff. It did ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a chainsaw. It cut stuff. It did exactly what it was supposed to do. It cost almost nothing. It took a little bit to adjust and get it started. The blade came incredibly tight so it actually needed to be loosened which I didn't anticipate. I'm not sure what else to say, do you have some tree limbs down in your lawn and need to remove them? Yes, this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Troma

customer_reviews.title: Bad design?
customer_reviews.text: The saw worked great for the first few hours. I changed the chain but it didn't run at the higher RPMs it had originally. The adjustment screw requires a special tool (not included). Haven't taken the time to fix as yet. I'll report back once I have the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chain saw had plastic parts
customer_reviews.text: Chain saw had plastic parts. This was not in product description.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F. Guillory

customer_reviews.title: ... to tighten the chain after first use but I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Had to tighten the chain after first use but I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: magic man

customer_reviews.title: Branches and Tree Limbs
customer_reviews.text: This saw is for tree limbs and branches, very light non-commercial use. I don't try bring down and whole tree.
customer_reviews.author: Gil O Vega

customer_reviews.title: What!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with chain oil. So I have it and need it but can't use it till I can make it to the store.
customer_reviews.author: nick craven

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the stack of logs I had to cut and the kids I had to scare as Leatherface for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great saw at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you want it to do. Starts easily.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stack

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my land. Started up after 3 pulls! Nice hard case as well! Highly recommend this chainsaw!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It starts easily and cuts well. It is easy to adjust the chain tension with the tool that is included. A sturdy case is also included, although the latches seem rather flimsy. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Lysles

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw for your typical home owner
customer_reviews.text: No issues whatsoever with this saw. Main negative reviews seem to be people trying to get the cheapest saw possible for more than standard home owner use. I used this for 5 hours cutting small limbs with no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a damaged state and it is hell to return it.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived damaged in the box and I have not even opened the case. Trying to return it and it is hell. I am being bounced back and forth between the amazon and manufacturer with no way to get any follow through lead or return authorization. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: barzin mobasher

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a great chainsaw. went and put gas and bar oil in it, went to lunch came back to start my job, and found this mess, picking the chainsaw up out of the case and there was all the bar oil in the case. Just great. I had to go buy a chainsaw to do my work for my client. :( :( :(
customer_reviews.author: squirrel

customer_reviews.title: very well built saw and it stars great. I would highly reccomend this product
customer_reviews.text: very well built saw and it stars great. I would highly reccomend this product. My brother saw mine and liked it so much he got me to order one for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's been a lot of help clean up the under brush and small jobs around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Harry l bigger

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good little saw for around the yard. Not a professional saw. Chain loosens easily but other than that excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One time chainsaw...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking chainsaw, but only lasted one hour and died. No repair shops the fix in my area in which is in Orlando FL. Company does not offer returns. I guess it goes to our halloween props...
customer_reviews.author: King David

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby cut down two trees the first day.Easy to work with.Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Mona L.Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to start
customer_reviews.text: Nice little saw, and it actually was very easy to start. Ive used it 4-5 times already.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN ALLAIN

customer_reviews.title: Good chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Great Chainsaw. Chain pops loose a lot. Gotta constantly tighten it up and keep it oiled slick. But great chainsaw
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Sent it out to mexico and my bff loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend down in mexico and he is in love with it. He seems to be cutting down every single dry tree he finds on his way lol. Great chainsaw!
customer_reviews.author: Dany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: You will not beat this saw with this price. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great value good tool!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, good saw for the price. Woth a carrying case that is better than poulan pros case. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and was very reasonably priced. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: lil butt
customer_reviews.text: Small chainsaw but when chain is sharp, it shreds dude!
customer_reviews.author: Sean curran

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Minimal use for small branches. Don’t even think of using it for regular logs. Electric chain saw is a much better investment
customer_reviews.author: jesse taveras

customer_reviews.title: Good saw.
customer_reviews.text: Runs first pull. Have used quite a bit now, has plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: william w.

customer_reviews.title: RM4216 16-inch Gas Powered Chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Remington RM4216 16-inch Gas Powered Chainsaw with Carrying Case doesn't work after onetime use. It is not good simply spoil the money of buying this item. Not in use right now. The product is not good.
customer_reviews.author: prakash chimoriya

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: worked out great for me thought it was a good price Nice case easy to use Nice transaction thanx
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Saw great. Amazon packing terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Saw works great. Started easily and cuts well. Remington needs more sturdy blade cover and case. Amazon horrible packaging yielded the same damage so many others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Cavan Woods

customer_reviews.title: First use and it wouldn't cut.
customer_reviews.text: Today was the first day we used it and we followed all instructions. It ran but would not cut. I followed the instructions to adjust the chain, used bar chain oil, etc. but the chain would stop when you attempted to cut. Even worse, I do not have the option to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse deBenedetto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: TERESA L. MANN

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for home owners
customer_reviews.text: Great saw for home owners. Great product for the money. I've has several trees down over the last few weeks and i cant complain about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisg

customer_reviews.title: fair purchase
customer_reviews.text: works pretty good, but at the beginning need struggle more than 30 times pull to make it run
customer_reviews.author: Kun

customer_reviews.title: Good to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and gets the job done. Just not for larger trees or stumps.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee McGee

product_meta.title: Gas Powered Chainsaw Automatic Chain Oiler-Anti Vibration System
product_meta.description: Introducing the go-to chainsaw for the suburban homeowner. Our most versatile gas model Features a 42cc engine & comes with a sprocket-tipped 16" bar & low-kickback chain for trimming & pruning medium to large-size branches. The RM4216 Rebel chainsaw has an adjustable automatic oiler that keeps the Chain In precision condition, while the die-cast chassis & pro-grade components make this one durable machine. Comes with comfort wrap handles & a handy storage case. Please refer to operator’s manual for guidance on use, maintenance, troubleshooting, & safety. Please refer to operator’s manual for guidance on use, storage, maintenance, troubleshooting, & safety. Backed by a 2-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: RELIABLE ENGINE: 42cc 2-cycle gas powered engine with low-kickback 16-inch bar and chain tames medium to large-sized branches. Perfect for the suburban homeowner!
COMFORTABLE OPERATION: Equipped with a 5-point anti-vibration system and cushion wrap handle for more balance and comfort while operating.
QUICKSTART TECHNOLOGY: Make pull starts easier to rev up and get right to cutting.
AUTOMATIC OILER: The adjustable automatic oiler keeps the chain in quality condition.
EASY MAINTENANCE: Tool-free access to filter and spark plug.
CARRY CASE INCLUDED: Heavy-duty case allows easier transportation and storage. 2-cycle oil also included with purchase.
